Prerequisite: Ranger class, archer fighting style

You become the ultimate hunter of beasts or magical beasts, stalking your chosen prey with deliberate cunning and amazing ease. Against your chosen prey, each arrow hits its mark with unerring accuracy and punishing velocity.

BEAST STALKER PATH FEATURES

Beast Stalker's Action (11th level)

When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you also gain a +4 bonus to attack rolls against your quarry until the start of your next turn.

Chosen Prey (11th level)

Choose one of the following keywords: beast or magical beast. Your Hunter's Quarry class feature deals an extra 2 damage against creatures of the chosen kind.

Action Shift (16th level)

After you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift as a minor action until the end of the encounter.

BEAST STALKER POWERS
